attributes.action: Announce the date for the end of the BETA TEST of his E-Petions process
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This site is at least six months old, perhaps they could explain that.
Dont they know how to work it, or what?

rejection.details: Thank you for your constructive feedback. Rest assured we shall take your comments most seriously.  Unfortunately we don't accept petitions about e-petitions.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
